name: Fvther Winter
description:
Fvther Winter is a body horror themed  holiday dungeon crawl written for System Agnostic OSR. It is intended for a party of 4 level 3 adventurers.

"For centuries, Father Winter has sat in his old frozen keep atop the highest peak of the tallest mountain, locked and sealed away until the Winter Solstice arrives for it is only then that he awakens from his frostbitten slumber to usher us into the dreary haze of winter and with it, the holiday season. However, this time of merriment and peace comes at a cost. That is where you come in."

WARNING - This module contains grpahic depictions of violence and gore and is recommended for a mature audience. Play at your own risk!

Written for the 2021 Beggar's Gate Holiday Jam
